name: China Voice Holding
overview: China Voice Holding Corp., a telecommunications company, provides technology solutions for voice-over-Internet protocol (VoIP), wireless, video conferencing, office automation, and multi-media applications primarily in the PeopleÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Republic of China and the United States. It offers office automation and internet telephony technology platforms for large enterprise and government applications. The company offers its products in three general categories: O/A Cooperative Office Solutions, O/A Integrated Office Solutions, and O/A Unified Processing Solutions. Its information and communication platforms use Web-based technology and enable multiple workers to collaborate on a single project.

acquisitions.source_description: China Voice Holding Corp. Acquires NTELEC Networks, LLC
